020package org.apache.wiki.ajax;
021
022import org.apache.wiki.plugin.SampleAjaxPlugin;
023
024import javax.servlet.ServletException;
025import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
026import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
027import java.io.IOException;
028import java.util.List;
029
030/**
031 * An interface for a servlet that wants to use Ajax functionality.
032 * See {@link SampleAjaxPlugin}
033 *
034 * @since 2.10.2-svn12
035 */
036public interface WikiAjaxServlet {
037
038    String getServletMapping();
039
040    void service( HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, String actionName, List< String > params ) throws ServletException, IOException;
041
042}
